casebody.data:
No. 10-8561. Simon Banks, Petitioner v. Devon Brown, Director, District of Columbia Department of Corrections. 562 U.S. 1260, 131 S. Ct. 1580,

179 L. Ed. 2d 482,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 1850, February 28, 2011.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the District of Columbia Circuit denied.
